name: Gulab Jamun
description: A popular dish of deep-fried milk balls soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup

name: Kheer
description: A creamy and delicious rice pudding cooked with milk, sugar, cardamom and nuts

name: Rasmalai
description: A soft and spongy cottage cheese dumpling soaked in saffron-infused milk and garnished with pistachios

name: Gajar Ka Halwa
description: A warm and comforting dessert made of grated carrots cooked with ghee, milk, sugar and nuts

name: Jalebi
description: A crispy and crunchy spiral-shaped sweet dipped in saffron sugar syrup

name: Hot Fudge Sundae
description: A classic dessert of vanilla ice cream topped with hot fudge sauce, whipped cream, chopped nuts, and a cherry

name: Cheesecake
description: A rich and creamy dessert of cream cheese, eggs, sugar, and sour cream baked on a crust of crushed graham crackers or cookies

name: Apple Pie
description: A traditional American dessert of sliced apples cooked with sugar, cinnamon, and lemon juice, enclosed in a flaky pastry crust

name: Brownies
description: A chewy and fudgy dessert of chocolate cake squares mixed with nuts or chocolate chips

name: Tiramisu
description: An Italian dessert of ladyfingers soaked in coffee and layered with mascarpone cheese, whipped cream, and cocoa powder
